name: Fantazy Sidebar
author: Jihad Sinnaour

sections.description:
If your Sidebar is too small comparing to your content area! Fantazy Sidebar will make it floatable.
This is a recently released version, built from scratch.

[1.6.3] – 06-10-2019

Fixed

  • Fixed Json Config Error

[1.6.2] – 06-10-2019

Fixed

  • Fixed Update Error

[1.6.0] – 06-10-2019

Major

  • Rebuild from scratch

[1.5.2] – 29-02-2016

Update

  • WordPress 4.4.2 Compatibility

[1.5.1] – 05-11-2015

Update

  • Added Class selector For Content
  • Added Class selector For Sidebar

[1.5.0] – 17-03-2015

Update

  • First Production Version

[Pre-release 1.0.0] 07-11-2014

Init

  • Basic Plugin
sections.installation:
1. Find the content & sidebar’s class selector (.sidebar,.content).
  2. Update plugin options : under Settings / Fantazy Sidbar.
sections.faq: Contact me at mail[@]jihadsinnaour.com for any Questions!

short_description: Fantazy Sidebar Makes WordPress Sidebar Floatable, With Less Code & More Performance.
